attributes.action: Reject any proposals suggested by MP's to discriminate against trans individuals
attributes.additional_details: It is essential that people treat Transgender people with equality and fairness and protect their rights as much as the general populations is.
attributes.background: We are informed that the anti-trans proposals listed in yesterday's Sunday Times article could hold some truth. These proposals included ‘new protections to safeguard female-only spaces…’ and ‘abandoning’ a self-determined procedure around GRA reform.
